text: viprAq hyE#tE yacCu#SruqvA(gm)sa#H kaviSaqsta ityA#ha kaqvayOq hyE#tE yacCu#SruqvA(gm)sOq brahma#sa(gm)Sitaq ityA#haq brahma#sa(gm)SitOq hyE#Sha GRuqtAha#vanaq ityA#ha GRutAhuqtirhya#sya priqyata#mA praqNIryaqj~jAnAqmityA#ha praqNIrhyE#Sha yaqj~jAnA(gm)# raqthIra#ddhvaqrANAqmityA#haiqSha hi dE#varaqthO#&tUrtOq hOtEtyA#haq na hyE#taM kaScaqna - [  ]  52
